doc:
Patrika Darbo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patrika_Darbo 0 Patrika Darbo (née Davidson; born April 6, 1948) is an American actress. She is known for her roles as Nancy Wesley and Shirley Spectra in the television soap operas Days of Our Lives and The Bold and the Beautiful, respectively. In 2016, Darbo won an Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Actress in a Short Form Comedy or Drama Series for her role in the online comedy series Acting Dead, becoming the first winner in that category. Patrika_Darbo ( née_Davidson ; born April_6_,_1948 ) is an_American_actress . She is_known for her_roles as Nancy_Wesley and Shirley_Spectra in the_television_soap operas Days of Our_Lives and The_Bold and the_Beautiful , respectively . In 2016 , Darbo won an_Primetime_Emmy_Award for Outstanding_Actress in a_Short_Form_Comedy_or_Drama_Series for her_role in the_online_comedy_series_Acting_Dead , becoming the_first_winner in that_category .
